title: First Post
content: I made blurbs because it's alot of work to try and make a new page for every thing so now i can just type them out here and not have to worry so much about formatting and consistancy.

title: Happy sugar life
content:
i was watching happy Sugar Life last night and it was much better than i remember. Last time i watched it, everyone seemed kind of irrational wih everything they did, but now that i have a better grasp on psychology and how trauma effects a person, most of the actions coincided with common irrational behaviors presented by people suffereing with the traumas the people in the show are dealing with.
still probably my favorite anime

title: Why is it so hard to get therapy?
content: i've been rejected by like 3 different practices to far :<

title: The Eiffel tower is so beautiful
content: i went to Paris recently and when seeing the Eiffel tower up close for the first time i dissociated for a full half an hour studying the tower. My engineering brain took over and i saw the forces in each member, a truely breathtaking experience.

title: Do something with your hands
content: I recently realized that computer screens really impact my derealism, staring at them makes me lose touch with reality and myself. I recently go back into sewing and a few other hobbies that are not going on the computer. Doing things with my hands has really helped me and i think it's important to remember since it seems half our lives are staring at screens now.

title: Digital Derealization
content: the screens are all encompassing, they make me forget im alive, they make me forget im in a place, that i have a body, then im ripped back into a sudo state of reality that is my default, a world of hints of the reality below, unfortunately, i very rarely get to experience that reality, but the world of the screens is just as comforting in it's own way.
